Dear Breda,

Thanks for your mail and your flight information. As it were, my
representative will probably arrive before you. I have a high profile
political case to battle for my client in the next few weeks hence my
inability to be there in person though the person representing me has done
similar deals for me in the past. I only need to settle him with his
commission as usual.

There should be no fears about your hotel. I will contact the manager of
the company over there and probably they will recomend good hotel for you
guys.

Like I wrote in my last mail, I think there is a misconception on your
part. You tlked about US$1200, when I was asking for assistance of
US$12000 (Twelve Thousand), having prepared US$15000 (Fifteen Thousand
Dollars), on my side which my representative will travel with, bringing
the total money for our charges to US$27000 (Twenty Seven Thousand
Dollars).

The transaction will not last more than three days going by similar deals
we have carried out in the past.

Meanwhile, I wish to state clearly here that this transaction is solely
done on cash basis, as you know the nature of the business we are into. No
one is ready to take chances and no one wants to leave any traces after
the deal.

I therefore request that you transform all monies into as that will help
facilitate the transaction very well. Again, remember we are making a
movement into an Arab nation where things do not work like in the west.

Hope to get all your reactions before close of the day today.

Thanks for your kind cooperation.

Yours Afeez.

messages.body:
Hello Afeez,

this will be my last email to you. I want to explain a few things. So please sit back and enjoy the ride.

A few weeks ago you sent me an email telling me that I could earn a lot of money. I only had to do a few simple things. My father always teached me: if things seem too good to be true, they are too good to be true. So was your proposal. From moment one I knew your proposal was fake. No one would ever believe that you would pay me millions of dollars, which were just waiting for me. I knew you were a fraudster. You still are.

I decided I could do 2 things: 1) either throw your proposal away or 2) make fun with you. I decided for option 2. And to be honest Afeez, I had a lot of fun. Fun in making you believe that I would accept your proposal. Fun in making you believe I would do everything you asked.

It was also very funny that you asked me to come to Dubai. The nice thing was that the KLM flight arrived very early in the morning. So you, or Steve, or both had to go to the airport and had to wait for someone who was not on board. Frustrating, wasn't it? You also held up a sign with Bolletjesslikkers Hier. I told you it was the name of an oil company. It is not. It means: I am waiting for drug smugglers. The nice thing is that I asked someone to make a picture of the man holding the sign. A very clear picture. No, I am not going to send you this picture. Ihave forwarded it to the FBI and to the Dubai Police. I also gave them your telephone number (971-50-3961849). They were very happy with that.

It was also very funny that Steve had to stand in front of the hotel with a balloon. Hot day, wasn't it? Jee, and Jack was not showing up. Of course not, Jack was at home, drink a cold beer and sending email messages to you. Signed with "sent from the Burj Al Arab Hotel". Of course, you or Steve visited this hotel to look for me.

How did the cognac and the cigars taste? You had to pay for them of course, but Jack didn't show up. You now know why.

Afeez, I had a lot of fun. But the fun is not over yet. I am going to forward your email message to your email provider. You will be cut off in a few days time. I willalso send all our emails toa special web site, which contains similar stories of clever people making fun of stupid 419 fraudster. It is a lot of fun to read these stories. Let me be honest; you are not the stupidest scammer around. You are stupid of course, very stupid, but some people are even more stupid. But people all over the world will get to know your name. And they will have a good time reading how stupid you are.

There is a good chance that you will be picked up by the law enforcement authorities in your country in the next couple of weeks. If I were you, I would not sleep very comfortable any more. But that is the price you have to pay for trying to rob other people. Just fair, don't you agree?

Well, Afeez, I hope you will fail in doing what you pursue.

Thanks again for the good time, MUGU !!

Jack Breda
